metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7685 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: GLPI before 0.85.3 allows remote authenticated users to create super-admin accounts by leveraging permissions to create a user and the _profiles_id parameter to front/user.form.php.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
